items.0: • One shipped AI feature (RAG chat, agentic workflow, or smart assist) tied to a metric.
items.1: • Guardrails: access control, rate limits, fallbacks, and human-in-the-loop if needed.
items.2: • Usage dashboard and simple analytics for adoption, latency, and feedback.
items.3: • Clear docs + 30-min recorded handover to extend with confidence.
items.4: • 30-day Bug Shield: critical fixes included post-launch.

items.0: • Not "AI for AI's sake". We refuse features users won't feel.
items.1: • Not a 3-month research project. Focused build that ships.
items.2: • Not custom LLM training. We move fast with proven building blocks.

0.title: Days 1-2 · Scope
0.description: Pick the metric, flow, and definition of done. Confirm data access and success threshold.

1.title: Days 3-10 · Build
1.description: Implement, mid-sprint demo, add guardrails, and wire up usage tracking.

2.title: Days 11-14 · Prove & Launch
2.description: Polish UX, add fallbacks, verify, ship to production, and read first metrics.

items.0: • Adoption: % of target users who used the feature this week.
items.1: • Faster flow: median time saved vs. baseline.
items.2: • Quality: "was this helpful?" score and reported errors.
items.3: • Cost control: cost per use under agreed ceiling.
items.4: • Reliability: p95 under target; no critical incidents.
items.5: • Business impact: 1 simple metric (e.g., ticket deflection rate).

guarantee.title: Simple guarantee
guarantee.description: If I miss the agreed metric or deadline due to me, I keep working at no extra cost until we hit it. Clear and aligned.
